main event: A civilian observed a star-like object hovering in the sky over White Plains, New York for 2 minutes on June 6, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as having a white color and shape similar to an average star., The observer noticed the object while looking at the stars at a high elevation., The object moved from southwest to northeast before disappearing into the clouds., The observer considered the possibility of the object being an aircraft or satellite., Scattered cloud conditions were reported at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Civilian, 24 years old, occupation salesman, BA education
